value.ultima_execucao: ={{    (() => {     const data = new Date(new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: 'America/Sao_Paulo' }));     const dia = String(data.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');     const mes = String(data.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');     const ano = String(data.getFullYear()).slice(-2);     const hora = String(data.getHours()).padStart(2, '0');     const minuto = String(data.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0');     return `${dia}/${mes}/${ano} - ${hora}:${minuto}`;   })()  }}

={{    (() => {     const data = new Date(new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: 'America/Sao_Paulo' }));     const dia = String(data.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');     const mes = String(data.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');     const ano = String(data.getFullYear()).slice(-2);     const hora = String(data.getHours()).padStart(2, '0');     const minuto = String(data.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0');     return `${dia}/${mes}/${ano} - ${hora}:${minuto}`;   })()  }}
